title: Meditation – Deep and Blissful:  How to Still The Mind’s Compulsive Thinking, Let Go of Upset, Tap Into the Juice and Meditate at a Whole New Level
description: A new edition of this book is available! This new edition includes seven guided meditations as audio downloads - your gift with purchase. The new edition replaces this edition and can be found here on Goodreads at https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/1...
author: Sharon Rose Summers
